CustomField.description:
If 'Gross Rate to Netsuite' is selected, Accounting will show the gross rate on the invoice with a % off for the discount.
If 'Bill Rate to Netsuite' is selected, Accounting will show the net rates on the invoice.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
If 'Gross Rate to Netsuite' is selected, Accounting will show the gross rate on the invoice with a % off for the discount.
If 'Bill Rate to Netsuite' is selected, Accounting will show the net rates on the invoice.
CustomField.label: SVC_Discount_Model
